pullRequest.title: [PDS-95791/Post Mortems] Local Lock Trackers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):

Be better able to track locks and unlocks when conducting a transaction post mortem.

Implementation Description (bullets):

Trace down local results of lock and unlock operations to enrich the post mortem runner.

Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):

Added a section to the TransactionPostMortemIntegrationTest.

Concerns (what feedback would you like?):

Is this too much overhead? Given it only happens under specific circumstances I think it's fine...
Is the queue size enforced correctly?

Where should we start reviewing?: LocalLockTracker
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday): this week

nodes.bodyText: Why do we mark this deprecated? Also, should we edit the todo message?
